has.from sentence:
TF - IDF
Retrieval - based models are known to be strong QA baselines if candidate answers are provided .

( 1 ) Document - cue During dataset construction we observed that certain document - answer pairs appear more frequently than others , to the effect that the correct candidate is often indicated solely by the presence of certain documents in Sq .
